content: rnds 1 24 of triangle stitch from chart or written 15 instructions 14 13 begin crown decreases 12 work rnds 1 10 of crown decreases from chart or written 11 10 instructions below 10 sts after all decrease s have been worked 9 8 round 1 *k11 p1 repeat from * around 7 round 2 decrease *k4 k3tog k4 p1 repeat from * around 50 6 sts 5 round 3 *p1 k7 p2 repeat from * around 4 round 4 decrease *p1 k2 k3tog k2 p2 repeat from * around 3 40 sts 2 round 5 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * around 1 round 6 decrease *p2 k3tog p3 repeat from * around 30 sts pattern repeat round 7 *p2 k1 p3 repeat from * around round 8 decrease *p1 p3tog p2 repeat from * around 20 sts round 9 p all sts round 10 decrease *p3tog p1 repeat from * around 10 sts finishing decrease chart break yarn leaving an 8 20 cm tail thread through live 10 sts and fasten_off soak in cool water and wool wash and 9 block to measurements 8 7 pom pom 6 make a 3 7 5 cm diameter pompom secure pom pom to 5 hat and tie off inside 4 3 label 2 using sewing thread or yarn provided in kit and a sharp 1 sewing needle sew kelbourne woolens label to brim as pattern repeat shown chart key knit p3tog purl k3tog ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #yearofbulkyhats ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved images © linette kielinski v 1 6 1 22 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 4
